categories.body: The Legend of Korra episode transcripts

paragraphs.body: We've got more company! [Lin metalbends a rail from the ceiling onto the track.] Hang on!
paragraphs.text: We've got more company! [Lin metalbends a rail from the ceiling onto the track.] Hang on!

paragraphs.body: Cut to Korra sitting in her box, who hears Tarrlok's scream of anguish as his bending is removed. She looks up toward the ceiling, and the camera pans up a floor as he collapses to the ground with wide open eyes. The Equalists all groan and stand up as Amon lifts Tarrlok's limp body onto his shoulders.
